title: Dat Ass! by JAB - X-Rated Comic in KF8/mobi format, in Panelview
description:
<b>DAT ASS! - Script & Art by JAB</B>

Reviewed & Converted to KF8/mobi Kindle "Panelview" comic format by Moby6666 with Amazon "Kindle Comic Book Creator".

JAB Comix have been around for years, entertaining the X-Rated Comic reading public.  All the comics contained in this torrent were taken from other torrents freely available to anyone who wished to download them. Most simply consisted of individual jpegs or png image files.  What I have attempted to do is convert these in to a comic book Kindle format with "panel-view" so they can be viewed on various Kindles, (Kindle Fire, Fire HD, Kindle Paperview, Kindle 3 and Kindle Keyboards with the most recent updates).

Recently, Amazon came out with "Kindle Comic Creator".  With this new application it is quite easy, (though time consuming), to create comics with "panel-view" from raw image files.  The resulting KF8, mobi files are easily read with the kindle magnifying each panel.		

This may be Jab's best story to date.  It certainly has the most dialogue, and some of his most potent artwork.

<b>Alex has a dilemma!</b>  He's in love with his Mom, Helen; more precisely, his Mom's luscious derriere!  Obsessed, Alex's room is in a constant state of wide-ranging spunk-splatter, but no amount of "choking-the-chicken" can deter him from pursuing his dream of tapping DAT ASS!

Who could blame him though; his Mom is, (of course), smoking hot, and seems to go through her daily life consciously, or perhaps unconsciously, scantily dressed and exposing her juicy bits for Alex to see.  

Whether it's scrubbing the shower, or lounging on the couch, her beautiful ass, tits and pussy are in his face and on full display.  If that didn't make it hard enough, (pun intended), she is more than a little affectionate to her boy; matter-of-factly touching and stroking his perpetually engorged organ and planting soulful, sticky, wet kisses on his ever-receptive mouth.

Alex's feelings may be more carnal than true love in origin, but the distinction can be a bit blurred, or entirely lost to a teenage boy in the throes of raging hormonal lust!

But now Alex is at his wits-end, and concerned over his depressed state, Helen finally persuades him to confide in her. Reluctantly, he shares his secret feelings and desires for her.  At first shocked, she promises she will consider his request, but makes it clear that there will be conditions that Alex must honor...

Will Alex realize his dream of becoming his mother's "backdoor lover", and what is the intimate secret that Helen conceals?
